## BitField.setRange() method

Sets bits from `start` index with given `values`<!-- -->. No bounds checking.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setRange(start: number, vals: string | ArrayLike<boolean>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  start | <code>number</code> |  |
|  vals | <code>string &#124; ArrayLike&lt;boolean&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
